title: Blushing Brides
description: Four brides, four stories with heat and heart from MINK, and their epilogues!These mountain men are in for the shock of their lives when four smart, beautiful, and vulnerable women land on their snowy doorstep.Knocking Up His Bride, Claiming His Bride, Stealing His Bride, and Taming His Bride are linked stories each with their own heroes, heroines, and HEAs (mischievous feline included!).
author: Mink
